Class Hand

java.lang.Object
Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Models a hand of cards that a particular player would hold. Can add/remove/get cards from their hand.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Hand(HandType handType)
    Creates a hand of cards initially empty.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(int index)
      Returns the card from the hand corresponding to the provided index.
      Parameters:
      index - The position of the card in the hand. Starts from 0.
      Returns:
      The card found in that position in the hand.
